title: After She Died - Novel Updates
tags: Adopted Children   Death of Loved Ones   Male Protagonist   Murders   R*pe   Second Chance   Short Story   Single Parent
author: 锦橙
description:
You are a single father living alone with your 16 year old daughter.

But one day —

Your daughter dies.

Suicide.

A month later, an extra game APP appears on your phone. The main character of the game is your daughter, who is being abused, violated, and ravaged.

The APP suggests that you have the chance to reset her life.>
